story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I believe everyone heard the voice saying “show
me thy bond” a while ago.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
It is highly likely that that was the voice of Arceus,
the deified Pokémon.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
The voice was heard the moment the sync stones
ultimate began to shine, but no one has been able
to draw out their true power.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I believe that Arceus’s will is linked to the
sync stones ultimate!
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Therefore, contestants will be asked to use them to
show their bond with their Pokémon!
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_0600_10:
The objective of this tournament is to respond to
Arceus’s voice!
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_0700_10:
At the Arceus Cup, participants can choose
their opponents!
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
This tournament isn’t about winning battles—it’s
about demonstrating the bond between you and
your partner.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_0900_10:
To be considered a winner in this tournament, you
must be deemed worthy by Arceus!
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Let’s show the deified Pokémon just how strong the
bonds of sync pairs can be!
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Six Trainers will be competing in today’s
tournament in response to Arceus’s voice.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_1200_10:
All competitors are here of their own volition and
desire.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_1400_10: I can tell just by looking at you...
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_1500_10:
you and your Dragonite have been
through a lot!
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_1600_10: Yeah, it’s all thanks to you.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_1800_10: We’re gonna compete with each other...
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_2100_10:
We’ll show you what a difference all that training
has made when we face off in battle!
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_2300_10:
I suppose it’s time to show you firsthand the
strength we found on our adventures.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_2400_10:
You’ve become stronger and more confident,
Steven.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_2500_10:
But remember, if you’re not strong enough, I’ll be
taking your seat as the Champion of Hoenn.
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_2600_10: I know the stakes. Bring it on!
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_2800_10:
This time, we’ll be battling in front of a crowd.
Given your title as Champion, you can't
afford to lose, can you?
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_3200_10: (It seems there's something more to her now...)
story_arceus_01_06000/2401_1001_3300_10: All right, everyone. Are you ready?
